    • Uses of Player in cis.monopoly.gamePlay

      Methods in cis.monopoly.gamePlay that return Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Player GameController.getCurrentPlayer()
      This method will search through the list of players in order to find the player that shares an id with the "currentPlayer" value.
      Player GameController.getSpecificPlayer(int iD)
      This method will search through the list of players in order to get the player that has id that matches the given value.
      Methods in cis.monopoly.gamePlay with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameController.bankPayPlayer(Player p, int amount)
      The amount given is added to the player's balance whilst that same amount is taken from the bank.
      void GameController.buyProperty(Player player, Property prop)
      A dialogue box pops asking the player if they would like to purchase the property.
      void GameController.movePlayer(Player p, int roll)
      Changes the Player's position value.
      void GameController.playerBuyProperty(Player player, Property prop)
      This method calls the payPayBank method and then sets the ownerId of the property to the player's ID.
      void GameController.playerPayBank(Player p, int amount)
      The amount given is subtracted from the player's balance whilst that same amount is given to the bank.
      void GameController.playerSellProperty(Player player, Property prop)
      This method calls bankPayPlayer which the bank gives whatever the price of the property is, then the property owner ID is then set to 0 for resale.
      void GameController.runPlayerTurn(int roll, Player player)
      Utilized to complete a player turn.
      static void GameController.transferPlayerFunds(Player p1, Player p2, int amount)
      The amount given is subtracted from the first player's balance, whilst the amount given is added to the second player's balance.
